QuestData.Title: After the Fall
QuestData.Description: Aww, that was nothin', really.$b$bThose statues were teetering as it was - just needed a little push is all.$b$bHow about you go and sort through that rubble?$b$bI've got a feeling we're close to getting this all sorted out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Orb of the Morning Star, the Orb of the Evening Star, Orb of the North Star and the Orb of the Shooting Star.
QuestData.RewardText: Fine work, $n.$b$b<Harrison studies the tablets.>$b$bIt looks as though our work here is nearly complete.
